Name: evolutionary_variant_of
Description: Gene or protein is an evolutionary variant of a parent

Name: represses_expression_of
Description: A relationship between a transcriptional regulator and a gene or gene product, in which the regulator is plays a negative role in the transcriptional process.

Name: is_small_molecule_inhibitor
Description: A relation between a continuant and a process, in which the continuant is a small molecule that inhibits the process

Name: stoichiometrically_homologous_to
Description: Homology that is defined by similarity with regard to selected stoichiometrical parameters.

Name: catalyze
Description: enzymes that facilitates the movement of transposons

Name: confers_resistance_to_antibiotic
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject (usually an enzyme, protein or other gene product) confers or contributes to clinically relevant resistance to a specific antibiotic drug. An entity is resistant to a chemical compound if and only if x is a pathogen and y is an antibiotic, and the fitness of that pathogen is not decreased when exposed to that antibiotic.

Name: confers_resistance_to_drug_class
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject (e.g. a gene family) confers or contributes to antibiotic resistance to the object (e.g. a drug class). It is a qualitative measure of antibiotic resistance, based on an experiment illustrating elevated MIC even outside of a clinical setting. A family of AMR genes confers resistance to a class of antibiotics if and only if all instances of that family confer resistance to some instances of that class in a pathogen.

Name: derives_from
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject has its origins from the object (paraphrased from Relationship Ontology).

Name: has_part
Description: A core relation that holds between a whole and its part. The subject has_part object. (paraphrased from Relationship Ontology)

Name: structurally_homologous_to
Description: Homology that is defined by similarity with regard to selected structural parameters.

Name: is_a
Description: An axiomatic relationship ontology term in which the subject is placed into a higher order classification (paraphrased from Relationship Ontology).

Name: participates_in
Description: A relation between a continuant and a process, in which the continuant is somehow involved in the process, e.g., this input material (or this output material) participates in this process.

Name: part_of
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject is but part of the object (paraphrased from Relationship Ontology).

Name: regulates
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject regulates expression of the object.

Name: relationship
Description: A relationship between two ontology terms.

Name: targeted_by
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject is targeted by the object (usually a class of antibiotics).

Name: targeted_by_antibiotic
Description: A relationship ontology term in which the subject is targeted by a specific antibiotic.
